00028 typedef struct {
00029     unsigned char fator; // RLE 8 bits
00030     unsigned char R1G1;
00031     unsigned char B1R2;
00032     unsigned char G2B2;
00033 } RLE8;

00228                                         }

00232                                         imagemRLE[k].fator = 1;

00235         #ifdef VERBOSE

00238         #endif

00247         #endif
